Jacques Barzun, Science :the glorious entertainment, p.66-67

"'Fact is reality; the rest is illusion. Science delivers facts; ergo, the other modes of thought deliver only illusion.' This habit, not to say reflex, of debunking is so fundamental in our society that it is necessary at this point to find out how it has become ingrained, having first shamed man out of believing the evidence of his senses."
